titleStmt.title: The curtaine drawne, or, The Parliament exposed to view the names of the members yet living of both houses of Parliament forceably secluded by the army in 1648, or since excluded by a few of their fellow members, confirming that force which they formerly disowned.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Prynne. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
